BEST SELLERS

Lewis & Clark Glamping

Looking for a different kind of experience? Ever stayed in a Yurt before? This Yurt is a one of a kind experience! This Yurt overlooks the Lee Metcalf Wildlife Refuge and take it from us and the reviews, the views you will enjoy are breath taking! This Yurt is cozy, comfortable, and stylish featuring a 30'x30' deck with a dining table for a view you and your family won't forget!

Bitterroot Retreat Dome

Are you looking for a unique tranquil get away emersed in Nature? Come and enjoy this phenomenal Eco Luxury dome! Boho themed dome sits directly next to the Lee Metcalf National Wildlife Refuge in the Bitterroot Valley of MT. The land is home to many bird species, elk, deer, and other wildlife

LONE PINE DONE

Looking for a truly unique experience emersed in Nature? This dome is nestled in a vast open space with a perfect view of the Montana Mountains in the distance. This dome is quaint, cozy and stylish providing a truly one of a kind experience! The stars above will wow you. The natural setting is soothing. The accommodations are cozy.

ABOUT US

What We Do

Global Glamping is a full stack glamping company founded in 2020. From concept to glampcamp we partner with you to accelerate the progress of your investment and ensure a flawless launch. If you have an existing glampcamp we support your vision by designing and implementing a custom expansion plan. ALL of this is accomplished through our proprietary business blueprint carried out by highly trained and experienced professionals.

Read More

OUR SERVICES

Let Global Glamping take the guess work out of managing your Glampsite! Working with booking platforms such as AirBnB and Hipcamp we will connect guests with your glampcamp to plan their perfect getaway stay. This partnership also includes managing regular housekeeping and maintenance of the property and related

View More
1

CLEANING

Creating content that your guests will love to engage with is so important. Our team of experts will make sure your guests are teaming with excitement to visit your Glamp Camp

2

DIGITAL

By managing your social media accounts, we will reach a wide range of potential guests who will love staying at your glampcamp!

3

DEVELOPMENT

Using fly-over drone footage, high resolution quality pictures, and captivating video the features and essence of your camp will be eloquently displayed for guests to envision their stay

4

CONTENT

We help generate revenue by ensuring your average nightly rental price is competitive in the marketplace by taking advantage of trends and local demand

5

ENGINEERING

Glampers are looking for "community and experiences". Global Glamping will scout your area for unique attractions and experience packages to offer your guests!

KAMRY HARPE

My GG experience is always unreal! I’ve stayed in yurts and geodomes built by this company. Every one is unique in its own way with views that will take your breath away! You also will not find better hospitality than you will with the owner, Devon! Such a great guy with so much talent!

KARIN WEBER

What an amazing journey it has been with Devon and his team . From the beginning of our decision to work with Global glamping to the present , Devon and his team have been more than helpful . answering questions , site prep, set up and after care of our project !!

KAITLYN SCULLEY

I would highly recommend global Glamping for any of your Glamping needs. I’ve seen first hand the heart and dedication that goes into the work they do. The time and effort the entire team puts into creating something amazing. Don’t look anywhere else, you’ve found the best!
